original_text: Judah's soldiers came to a tower from where they could see the desert. They looked at the large army of their enemies. But they could not see any soldier who was still alive! They only saw dead bodies that were lying on the ground.
korean_text: 유다 사람이 들 망대에 이르러 그 무리를 본즉 땅에 엎드러진 시체들뿐이요 한 사람도 피한 자가 없는지라

sentences.original_text: Judah's soldiers came to a tower
from where they could see the desert
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 그들은 광야를 볼 수 있었다

sentences.original_text: They looked at the large army of their enemies
But they could not see any soldier
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 어떤 군사도 볼 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: that were lying on the ground
